verses.verse: A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>, Maschil <S%H4905><s%>. Blessed <S%H835><s%> is he whose transgression <S%H6588><s%> is forgiven <S%H5375><s%>, whose sin <S%H2401><s%> is covered <S%H3680><s%>.
Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H120><s%> unto whom the LORD <S%H3068><s%> imputeth <S%H2803><s%> not iniquity <S%H5771><s%>, and in whose spirit <S%H7307><s%> there is no guile <S%H7423><s%>.
When I kept silence <S%H2790><s%>, my bones <S%H6106><s%> waxed old <S%H1086><s%> through my roaring <S%H7581><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long.

For day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> thy hand <S%H3027><s%> was heavy <S%H3513><s%> upon me: my moisture <S%H3955><s%> is turned <S%H2015><s%> into the drought <S%H2725><s%> of summer <S%H7019><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

I acknowledged <S%H3045><s%> my sin <S%H2403><s%> unto thee, and mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%> have I not hid <S%H3680><s%>. I said <S%H559><s%>, I will confess <S%H3034><s%> my transgressions <S%H6588><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; and thou forgavest <S%H5375><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of my sin <S%H2403><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

For this shall every one that is godly <S%H2623><s%> pray <S%H6419><s%> unto thee in a time <S%H6256><s%> when thou mayest be found <S%H4672><s%>: surely in the floods <S%H7858><s%> of great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> they shall not come nigh <S%H5060><s%> unto him.

Thou art my hiding place <S%H5643><s%>; thou shalt preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from trouble <S%H6862><s%>; thou shalt compass <S%H5437><s%> me about with songs <S%H7438><s%> of deliverance <S%H6405><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
I will instruct <S%H7919><s%> thee and teach <S%H3384><s%> thee in the way <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H2098><s%> thou shalt go <S%H3212><s%>: I will guide <S%H3289><s%> thee with mine eye <S%H5869><s%>.

Be ye not as the horse <S%H5483><s%>, or as the mule <S%H6505><s%>, which have no understanding <S%H995><s%>: whose mouth <S%H5716><s%> must be held <S%H1102><s%> in with bit <S%H4964><s%> and bridle <S%H7448><s%>, lest <S%H1077><s%> they come near <S%H7126><s%> unto thee.
Many <S%H7227><s%> sorrows <S%H4341><s%> shall be to the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: but he that trusteth <S%H982><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall compass <S%H5437><s%> him about.
Be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and rejoice <S%H1523><s%>, ye righteous <S%H6662><s%>: and shout <S%H7442><s%> for joy, all ye that are upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
